name: empirechain
description: Empire Chain is a JavaScript framework that streamlines AI development by seamlessly integrating LLMs (OpenAI, Anthropic, Groq), vector stores (Qdrant, ChromaDB), document processing, speech-to-text, web crawling, data visualization, and interactive chatbots into a unified interface. With Empire Chain, you can effortlessly build advanced AI applications like RAG systems.
author: EmpireChain Foundation
